attributes.action: assume responsibility for making the British public aware that we all need to be working longer and harder.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If the British public want successive governments to meet their ever-increasing demands, to subsidize the genuinely less fortunate amongst us and to help contribute to other, less fortunate nations, we need to be making more money. Which means we need to be more competitive. Which means we all need to be working longer and harder.
 
Britain is an island with limited resources. If somebody pulls the plug whist we’re all busy vying to do ever less work for ever more money, we’re all going to starve.
